title: He’s the Legendary Guard, Isn’t He? - Novel Updates

tags: Alternate World   Court Official   Criminals   Dungeons   Game Elements   Guilds   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hiding True Abilities   Hunters   Level System   Magic   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Prison   Special Abilities   Weak to Strong

description: Taking place in South Korea, an ordinary prison ward named Lee Shi Hyun got brutally dumped by his girlfriend. He awakens on the same day, but there’s something wrong with this awakening.>
